input_text:
Job Title: Independent Agent

Location: United States

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Business Development, Sales

Description:
Job description
The World's Biggest Problems
With today's glaring financial struggles and imminent changes of skyrocketing taxes and lack of financial education, we are rapidly expanding to meet the tremendous demand for professional financial guidance. Our mission is to help clients understand how to plan for their future by making educated financial decisions. In reality, most people are NOT financially educated and this information is NOT offered in the traditional school system. 
The World's Biggest Solution
We offer free financial education webinars and workshops focusing on the pillars of finance and tax-free wealth principles. We approach each situation with the person's best interest at heart and provide customized solutions. Our free weekly classes provide access to the information that is usually only offered to the top 1% of the population. 
Capturing Market
Morado Financial is one of the fastest-growing teams in the financial industry because of our simple, proven, systematic approaches to helping clients and teaching and training Independent Agents. We help frustrated professionals break through the barriers of limited promotions, being undervalued, and the 9 to 5 mindset in a simple, uncomplicated manner. 
This is a flexible remote role for an Independent Agent partnered with Morado Financial. The Independent Agent will be responsible for providing financial education and services to clients, including breaking down complex financial jargon into simple terms, analyzing financial data, and creating customized financial strategies.
Independent Agents have access to the training necessary to become licensed professionals as well as the mentoring and support to launch their own businesses. We offer state-of-the-art technology, continuing education, business-building guidance, and marketing resources to help you promote, monitor, and grow your business.
This is a business opportunity in the Financial Services Industry that requires a $125 mandatory background check.This opportunity is 100% commission pay (Not hourly or salary), meaning there is unlimited potential for growth in the highest-paid industry in the US. 
Qualifications
Strong analytical and problem-solving skillsExcellent communication and interpersonal skillsPassion for helping othersEntrepreneurial MindsetStrong Morals and ValuesIndustryFinancial ServicesEmployment TypePart-Time, Full-time

Experience Level (if available): None

output_json.title: Independent Agent
output_json.summary: Flexible remote role for an Independent Agent partnering with Morado Financial to provide financial education and services to clients.
job_responsibilities: Providing financial education and services to clients
Breaking down complex financial jargon into simple terms
output_json.company_information: Morado Financial is one of the fastest-growing teams in the financial industry.

other.content: Strong analytical and problem-solving skills, Excellent communication and interpersonal skills, Passion for helping others, Entrepreneurial Mindset, Strong Morals and Values
